entry.title: Welcome Gabriel!
entry.content: Gabriel Gonzalez Parrado has joined our lab to as a research intern to complete his bachelor internship.
entry.summary: Gabriel Gonzalez Parrado has joined our lab to as a research intern to complete his bachelor internship.

entry.title: Miguel continues in the lab as a PhD Candidate

link.title: Miguel continues in the lab as a PhD Candidate

entry.content: We are very happy to announce that Miguel Navarro Castro will continue to work in the lab, now as a PhD candidate! He has joined the Mathematics PhD program to pursue his PhD thesis in collaboration with Prof. M. José Jimenez.
entry.summary: We are very happy to announce that Miguel Navarro Castro will continue to work in the lab, now as a PhD candidate! He has joined the Mathematics PhD program to pursue his PhD thesis in collaboration with Prof. M. José Jimenez.

entry.title: Ramón y Cajal Fellowship
entry.content: We are very happy to announce that we have been awarded the prestigious Ramón y Cajal Fellowship that will support the lab from August 2025 to July 2030.
entry.summary: We are very happy to announce that we have been awarded the prestigious Ramón y Cajal Fellowship that will support the lab from August 2025 to July 2030.

entry.title: Welcome Miguel!
entry.content: Miguel Navarro Castro has joined our lab to work on a summer project in collaboration with Prof. M. Jose Jimenez, thanks to a summer scholarship from the Mathematics Institute at the University of Seville (IMUS).
entry.summary: Miguel Navarro Castro has joined our lab to work on a summer project in collaboration with Prof. M. Jose Jimenez, thanks to a summer scholarship from the Mathematics Institute at the University of Seville (IMUS).

entry.title: Welcome Pablo!
entry.content: Pablo Martín Berna has joined our lab to pursue his undergraduate thesis in collaboration with Prof. M. Jose Jimenez.
entry.summary: Pablo Martín Berna has joined our lab to pursue his undergraduate thesis in collaboration with Prof. M. Jose Jimenez.

entry.title: Welcome Andrea!
entry.content: Andrea Theodorou joins the lab as a Lab Technician.
entry.summary: Andrea Theodorou joins the lab as a Lab Technician.

entry.title: The Sy(stem)s Developmental Biology Lab opens its doors at the CABD

link.title: The Sy(stem)s Developmental Biology Lab opens its doors at the CABD

entry.content: The Sy(stem)s Developmental Biology Lab opens its doors at the CABD! And we discuss the journey in a new post in the New PI Diaries organized by The Node.
